items.sentence: You won\'t pass the exam if you don\'t study for it.
Tom studies French every evening for thirty minutes.
Tom always keeps his dog on a leash in public areas.
Tom and I both came to Boston when we were children.
Tom and I had a cup of coffee together this morning.
Tom and I have been good friends since we were kids.
I don\'t think that I know anyone named Tom Jackson.
I don\'t think that Tom could see what was going on.
I don\'t think that Tom is going to want to do that.
I don\'t think that Tom knows where his umbrella is.
